<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deliberate Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=2355) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 29 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You are about to gain the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition as a result of another creature's attack or ability, and that creature is within your melee reach.

</column>

---

Once, you died because someone—murderer or monster, soldier or executioner— chose to strike you down. Just before losing consciousness, make a melee Strike against the triggering creature.

**Special** You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
name: Deliberate Death
